snippet: The federal police on Wednesday detained the treasurer of the governing Workers’ Party, João Vaccari Neto, in connection with an investigation into corruption at the state-run oil giant Petrobras.
abstract: Brazilian authorities detain governing Workers' Party treasurer Joao Vaccari Neto in connection with kickback scheme at oil giant Petrobas.
lead_paragraph: The federal police on Wednesday detained the treasurer of the governing Workers’ Party, João Vaccari Neto, in connection with an investigation into corruption at the state-run oil giant Petrobras.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Party Official Is Arrested
